imgDesc.text:
A mysterious clockwork meka device created by the special energy system produced by Fontaine. It possesses three energy states: Ousia, Balanced, and Pneuma, and these states can be altered when attacked by their opposite.
Among the three, the <color=#ffe14b>Balanced</color> state should be the proper state objects exist in, but as with many things in the world, what is "proper" is rarely what is "common."
